Question: There was no shade for Jenny.  She was forced to lie there exposed to what?
Options: A. full sunlight B. bright sunshine C. sunny place D. eat cake E. direct sunlight

Jenny was forced to lie there exposed to direct sunlight. There was no shade and hence, she was exposed to full sunlight which is the direct rays of the sun. All the other options are either not related to sunshine or not an answer to the question. Hence, the correct answer is E. Direct sunlight.
